sdiaudiooutput: 2 channels in 3G-SDI 48Khz and 24 bit. 2 channels for talkback on channel 15-16.
controls: Push button controls for navigating menus.
power: Integrated Lithium Ion Polymer rechargeable battery. 11V-30V DC port for external battery power or use included 12V AC adapter.
analogaudiooutput: Aviation headphone (Fixed Wing Plugs) output for talkback and audio monitoring
analogaudioinput: 2 x XLR analog switchable between mic and line levels. Phantom power support.
operatingsystems: Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion or later. Windows 7 or later.
remotecontrol: 1 x 2.5mm LANC for Iris Control and Focus. SDI CCU control from ATEM.
computerinterface: USB 2.0 Mini-B port for software updates.
iriscontrol: Iris button automatically adjusts the lens iris settings so no pixel is clipped in film mode. Scene average auto exposure in video mode.
mountingoptions: 2 x 3/8” tripod mount. 4 x 1/4"-20 UNC thread mounting points on top of camera, 3 x 1/3”-20 UNC thread mounting points left on right of camera.
